item.title: Cargo Restraint Systems/Devices – Cargo Compartment Remains Empty (Main Deck Only)

remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing provided associated cargo compartment remains empty.

numlitem.para: Ensure the Load Supervisor or authorized personnel has signed the load manifest. This signature indicates that the load planning system has accounted for any aircraft load restriction resulting from the inoperative equipment and that the aircraft has been loaded in accordance with all UPS weight and balance limitations.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS stating associated cargo compartment "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
